mapper.select: select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_workunit f on a.ecode=f.ecode where a.ecode=#{ecode} and f.workunit_id=#{workunit_id}
select * from ems_installin a where a.id=(select max(installin_id) from ems_installinlist where ecode=#{ecode})

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from (select f.*,a.subtype_id,a.prod_id,a.brand_id,a.supplier_id,a.style from ems_equipment a inner join ems_installinlist f on a.ecode=f.ecode and f.installIn_id=#{installIn_id}) a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id
